weekly_top_story.headline: Trump Administration Recalls Nearly 30 U.S. Ambassadors in Unprecedented Foreign Service Shakeup
weekly_top_story.summary: The Trump administration recalled nearly 30 U.S. ambassadors and senior diplomats, primarily Biden appointees, to enforce an 'America First' agenda, signaling a major realignment in U.S. foreign policy with potential ripple effects on global diplomacy.

stories.headline: Deadly Gas Explosion Levels Part of Pennsylvania Nursing Home, Described as Mass Casualty Incident
stories.summary: A massive gas explosion destroyed part of a nursing home in Bucks County, PA, prompting a desperate search for survivors amid holiday chaos and highlighting vulnerabilities in aging infrastructure.

stories.headline: Powerful Storms Slam U.S. Coasts, Disrupting Christmas Travel Rush and Threatening Flash Floods
stories.summary: Twin storms battered the East and West Coasts, causing widespread travel disruptions during peak holiday period and posing life-threatening flash flood risks in Southern California.
